# fontStyle(at:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the font style and range at the index position.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc func fontStyle(at index: String.Index) -> (AVCaption.FontStyle, Range<String.Index>)
```

## Parameters

- **index**: A character position in the caption text.

## Return Value

A tuple that contains the font style and range to which it applies.

## Accessing font styles

- **AVCaption.FontStyle**: Font styles for caption text.
- **fontWeight(at:)**: Returns the font weight and range at the index position.
- **AVCaption.FontWeight**: Font weights for a caption.
- **decoration(at:)**: Returns the text decoration at the index position.
- **AVCaption.Decoration**: Text decorations for caption text.
